Reference

Plotting

Plotting functions for each figure_type_id

plot_figure()

Plot RUB figure

rub_plot_type_1()

Plot vertical stacked bar chart (figure type 1)

rub_plot_type_1_and_4()

Plot grouped line chart on top of vertical stacked bar chart (figure type 5)

rub_plot_type_2()

Plot vertical stacked bar charts that are scaled to 100% (figure type 2)

rub_plot_type_3()

Plot horizontal stacked bar charts that are scaled to 100% (figure type 3)

rub_plot_type_4()

Plot grouped line chart (figure type 4)

Scaling

Wrappers for

scale_color_rub()

Color scale constructor for RUB colors

scale_fill_rub()

Fill scale constructor for RUB colors

Colors and palettes

Wrappers for

get_RUB_colors()

Function to extract RUB palette colors as hex codes

get_RUB_palettes()

Return function to interpolate a RUB color palette

RUB_colors

RUB colors

RUB_palettes

RUB color palette

Reporting

Wrappers for

get_author()

Get author for report title page

get_file_name()

Get file name for automatic report generation

get_file_path()

Get file path for automatic report generation

get_title()

Get title for report title page based on the column report_nr

filter_destatis_code()

Filter data frame using the Destatis table code, discarding all columns that only consist of NA.

filter_report()

Filter data frame based on report_nr column

render_report()

Render report

Theming

Wrappers for

rub_style_flextable()

Applies RUB-Style to Flextable object

theme_rub()

Add RUB theme to ggplot chart

rub_format_mixed()

Format flextable mixed type columns (integer, percentages, NAs)

rub_format_percent()

Format flextable columns with percentages (percentages, NAs)

Data

Included data sets

df_fake

Fake data set illustrating the use of the RUBer parameterized reporting package.
